meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one hundredth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured 50 centiliters of water into the glass.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for 75 centiliters of milk.
meanings.sent3: The tiny centiliters were having a race to see who could fill up the bottle first.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was immeasurable, like centiliters of water in an endless ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sound of centiliters pouring into the measuring cup was like music to her ears.

meanings.definition: A centiliter is a metric unit of volume equal to one hundredth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: The medicine was measured in centiliters for accuracy.
meanings.sent2: She needed to buy 20 centiliters of orange juice for the party.
meanings.sent3: The centiliters in the beaker whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed out of him like centiliters from a tipped over bottle.
meanings.sent5: The scent of flowers filled the room, measured in centiliters of perfume.
